alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 03 at 2:23AM EST until March 03 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG AND SMOKE ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR THE EDGEWATER AREA UNTIL 7 AM THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility reduced to less then one quarter mile in a mixture of dense fog and smoke. * WHERE...The Edgewater area of Coastal Volusia County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM his morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Florida Highway Patrol reports that I-95 southbound is closed around Mile Marker 244 from near zero visibility in a combination of dense fog and smoke. Traffic cameras show what appears to be a significant accident and active fire in that location.
info.instruction: Avoid this area if possible! If you are driving on I-95 near or approaching the Edgewater area, especially on I-95, be prepared to encounter near zero visibility from fog and smoke!
